effect.shortEffect: Increases the same-type attack bonus from 1.5× to 2×.
effect.full: This Pokémon inflicts twice as much damage with moves whose types match its own, rather than the usual same-type attack bonus of 1.5×.

description.diamond-pearl: Powers up moves of the same type.
description.platinum: Powers up moves of the same type.
